"Fishtails infest the water, and mists walk the land. Give me simple solid rock any day."
—Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

Enchanted creature gains flying.
Sacrifice Phantom Wings: Return enchanted creature to owner’s hand.

extendedData.name: FlavorText
extendedData.value: "But you said 'when goats fly!'" Squee whined.

—Ertai, wizard adept

extendedData.value:
"Men and rats both hunger: we for our playthings; they, for us."
—Crovax

extendedData.name: FlavorText
extendedData.value:
"In the heart of Llanowar the magic is so strong that trees cannot stay rooted."
—Mirri of the Weatherlight

—Ertai, wizard adept

"I felt unworthy even to dream of it."
—Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

extendedData.value:
When Roc Hatchling comes into play, put four shell counters on it.
During your upkeep, remove a shell counter from Roc Hatchling.
As long as Roc Hatchling has no shell counters on it, it gets +3/+2 and gains flying.

extendedData.value: When Rogue Elephant comes into play, sacrifice a forest or bury Rogue Elephant.

extendedData.value: "You will sharpen your teeth on my enemies' bones," Maraxus promised them, and his ogres cheered.

T: Add four colorless mana to your mana pool.

extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value: During your upkeep, bury all artifacts and enchantments.

extendedData.name: FlavorText
extendedData.value:
"Just think of me as the storm before the calm."
—Gerrard of the Weatherlight

—Karn, silver golem

extendedData.value: Attacking does not cause creatures you control to tap.

—Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

extendedData.value: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking is assigned to block this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)

extendedData.name: FlavorText
extendedData.value: In its world of complete darkness, it has no shadows to fear.

extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value: Return X target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand and lose X life.

extendedData.name: FlavorText
extendedData.value:
"You must be mad to want one such as I aboard the Weatherlight. But I would be mad to remain here with my rotting family. I accept."
—Crovax

extendedData.value: W, Remove a creature card in your graveyard from the game: Gain 1 life.

—Gerrard of the Weatherlight

extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value: Each player chooses a creature with the highest total casting cost he or she controls, then pays an amount of mana equal to that creature’s total casting cost or buries the creature.
